definition: a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon

sentences.chinese: 香帐簇成排窈窕，金针穿罢拜婵娟。

sentences.english: Moon, pour China, long life, thousands of miles of the moon were.

definition: bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
late at night/in the dead of night
lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
(literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
Lord of the East, the sun God of Chinese mythology
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
